sentences.sContent: All the fighters landed safely on the airport after the military maneuver.
sentences.sContent_eng: All the fighters landed safely on the airport after the military maneuver.
sentences.sCn: 在军事演习后，所有战斗机都安全降落在机场上。

sentences.sContent: “The smaller the bird, the more viscous the air is,” he said, which is partly why hummingbirds can maneuver so well and for so long.
sentences.sContent_eng: “The smaller the bird, the more viscous the air is,” he said, which is partly why hummingbirds can maneuver so well and for so long.
sentences.sCn: “鸟类的体型越小，空气的粘性就相对越大，”他说，这也是为什么蜂鸟如此灵活且机动时间如此之长的部分原因。

remMethod.val: 来自希腊文manu operare(用手做事)

words.tran: 可操作性；[航][车辆][船] 机动性
